identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

block.p: LEAD: Monty Alexander, a pianist, is to lead his Ivory and Steel Jamboree, featuring Othello Molineau on steel drums, tonight through Sunday at Carlos 1, 432 Avenue of the Americas, at Ninth Street (982-3260). Sets begin at 9 and 11 P.M., plus a 12:30 A.M. set tonight and tomorrow; there is a $10 cover with a $7 minimum at tables and a one-drink minimum at the bar.
